# Functions / Variables

| Functions / Variables Name | Description                                       | Status |
| -------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------- | ------ |
| os                         | Returns on which os is working                    | ✅     |
| isCI                       | Checks if the code is running in a CI environment | 😴     |
